<js>
var url=[];
a=@get:{number};
a=a/20+1;
url[0]=baseUrl+"?page=2";
url[1]=baseUrl+"?page=3";
if(a>3)
  for (i=4;i<=a;i++)
    url[i-2]=baseUrl+"?page="+i;
url;
</js>

<js>
tmp=java.ajax("http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/ranking/gender");
tmp=JSON.parse(tmp);
cate=java.ajax("http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/cats/lv2");
cate=JSON.parse(cate);
result="";
function f(a,b) {
	var x="";y=tmp[a];
	for (i in y) 
{x+=b+y[i].shortTitle+"::/ranking/"+y[i]._id+"&&";}
	result +=x;
	};
